Entries.Mon2: Did you... find some Golden Walnuts today?#$e#No... don't share them with me. My family needs them most.$3#$e#I'll find enough for myself.
Entries.Mon4: I've learned a lot from my parrot family...#$b#But I'm sure there's a lot more out there I don't know.$s
Entries.Tue: When Sun is angry, it feels good in the jungle.#$e#Sun can't find us beneath the leaves. We trick him! Haha...$h
Entries.Tue2: Is Willy your friend?#$e#...He's nice.#$e#I'm not so shy with him.
Entries.Tue4: ...My hut? No, I couldn't build it by myself.$3#$e#The parrots are good helpers. They help me so much. You know?#$e#Do they help you, too?
Entries.Wed2: Be careful in the volcano... the spirits don't like outsiders.
Entries.Wed4: ...@, do birds ever fly here from your home?$3
Entries.Thu: Have you met the others like you?#$b#I don't talk to them much. I feel safer with my own kind...$3
Entries.Thu2: You know mangoes? They're... mmmmm! Delicious!$h#$e#I once ate them every day. My favorite tree grew them.#$b#...But then, the sky got mad... and broke the tree with lightning.$s#$e#...More trees can grow again, right?
Entries.Thu4: Oh, @! You're here!$h#$e#I'm happy you keep coming here so much.
Entries.Fri: One time... I was at the top of the volcano at night, and I saw lights far, far away.#$b#I wonder if there are other bird families out there?$3
Entries.Fri2: Sometimes I see an old man, with... what are they called? Glasses.#$e#I don't think he knows I'm here.$3
Entries.Fri4: I wonder if I could see your home from the top of the volcano?
Entries.Sat: ...I'm sad today.$s#$e#You go on... have fun. Let me be sad.$s
Entries.Sat2: ...You come here on a boat? Willy, too?#$e#No... I can't ride boats. Too scared...$s#$e#Mother... Father...$s
Entries.Sat4: I'm scared to ride a boat, because...$s#$b#...but, do you think Willy could help me try?
Entries.Sun: When it rains, strange birds visit.#$b#I try to speak to them... but they fly away.$s#$b#I guess they don't want to be friends...$s
Entries.Sun2: I've seen an old woman on the island's other side. Have you?$3#$e#...I'm shy to her. And scared.$s#$e#I don't think she wants to be friends with birds.$s#$e#But you do.
Entries.Sun4: Don't be afraid of gorillas if you see them.#$b#Just be nice to them. They will be nice to you.
Entries.summer_Mon: Hm? You ask about my... birthday?$3#$b#Um... what season is this? I don't have a... what is it? A calendar.$3#$e#Oh, this is summer now? It's... summer 26! The parrots told me I hatched on that day.
